title: Love Island Jourdan Riane and Danny Williams split
text:
Jourdan and Danny have reportedly split (Picture: ITV Picture Desk) The Love Island 2019 couples are continuing to drop like flies.

Just days after it was confirmed that India Reynolds and Ovie Soko had bit the dust, it seems Jourdan Riane and Danny Williams have suffered the same fate.

The couple have reportedly split after a three month romance, despite already moving in together.

According to The Sun, Jourdan, 24, dumped the model after hearing rumours that Danny had been flirting with other women as he upped his partying.

A source told the publication: ‘Jourdan started to hear rumours he was speaking to other girls behind her back. She confronted him about it but he just laughed it off.

The couple had already moved in together (Picture: Instagram)

‘Next thing she knows, Jourdan is getting messages from girls saying Danny he’s been flirting with them and then she hears he’s spent all night partying with loads of random women.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘She called him and told him it was over and that he wouldn’t be wasting her time anymore.’

They added that Danny barely put up a fight when being dumped.

Jourdan has no pictures on her profile on Danny since a photo shared on 8 September, although Danny posted a throwback pic this month featuring his ‘love’.

This shock split comes just weeks after the couple confirmed they had moved in together.

While it was assumed that Jourdan had moved into her own house alone, Danny, 21, was seen holding the keys to the same gaff and wrote on Instagram: ‘Feeling grateful to be able to make this possible. Hard work pays off🥂Excited for the next chapter.’

Jourdan reportedly ended things (Picture: Splash News)

The pair were only a couple for a few days in the villa, following Danny’s romances with Yewande Biala and Arabella Chi, but just a week after they were dumped from the island, the islanders had made it official.

Being grilled over their relationship on Channel 5, Danny claimed he could see things long-term with Jourdan as she had met his family and they were planning holidays in the future.

He said: ‘I said to you, when you met my parents, this has got long-term written all over it, and I’ve never said that before in a relationship.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘She met everyone – grandmas, little cousins, everybody loved her, and for me that’s a massive thing.

‘I think if that’s happening already I can definitely see long-term future plans with you.’

Now just two couples from the class of 2019 remain – Molly Mae Hague and Tommy Fury, and Curtis Pritchard and Maura Higgins.

Let’s hope the winter edition has better luck.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Jourdan and Danny’s reps for comment.

description: Love Island's Jourdan Riane has reportedly dumped Danny Williams after the pair moved in together.
